text: Another common root cause of hair loss in women and men is alopecia areata – an autoimmune disease which more than 2 to 3 percent of American populace is battling with. The condition could be due to heredity. About 1 in 5 people suffering from alopecia areata have a family history of the disorder.When cells in hair follicles are by mistake attacked by the immune system, the condition develops. Besides, alopecia areata, consumption of certain medicines and medical conditions such as thyroid and anemia also lead to hair-loss.According to hair-loss and psychology experts, hair-loss negatively impacts self-confidence and self esteem as well. Women have been observed to suffer from lower self-esteem more than men due to hair-loss. Hair-loss can be quite devastating to women’s self-esteem. Social withdrawal, avoiding work-outs and overeating increase due to increasing hair-loss. Psychologists and hair experts advise to take proper medical advice and follow a healthy lifestyle to deal with hair-loss.
